description: An island mentioned by Mela in the archipelago that extends east into the Aegean from the southern tip of the Magnesian peninsula of Greece. It is probably to be identified with modern Tsougkria, which is located off the southeast coast of Skiathos.

history.comment: title (to match the only source of the name: Mela)
